drivers.name: lxm5700m
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Monochrome driver for the Lexmark 5700. Fast and less memory consuming alternative to the "pbm2l7k" colour driver. You should have it installed when you do not only use your printer for images but also for letters and listings.

notes:
Works Black and White only with the Ghostscript 5.50 Lexmark 5700 driver. Note: only prints using Ghostscript from Postscript input. Use a2ps to convert print plain text to Postscript.

Consumables/Refills: black (like XJ8C) and color
